About Me

Hi there,

I'm Smiley sorry Akinwunmi Oluwaseun :). I'm a final year student of the Department of Systems Engineering, Unilag.

My friends call me Smiley cos I smile a lot.

I'm a Software Engineer with interests in Web Development, AI, ML and Computer Vision.

This is my tiny little space on the internet where I display my "Art" and share my opinion on "stuff" so feel free to explore.
